# n6py[![PyPI Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/n6py?color=%23141414&style=for-the-badge)](https://pypi.org/project/n6py)[![PyPI Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/n6py?color=%23141414&style=for-the-badge)](https://pypi.org/project/n6py)> ‚ö° AI Power ToolsPython Power Tools for Scientific Computing, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.[Read the Docs to Learn More](https://py.n6.ai).## Try OnlineClick one of the icons to start with a fresh copy of `n6py` in an online environment.
Colab
Binder
Kaggle
## Features- üêç Python - Utility library for AI Python projects.- üìÉ Jupyter Notebooks - Designed for use inside Jupyter Notebooks but also works in regular .py files.- ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud - Notebook Cloud Environment compatible e.g. Google Colab.- üë∂ Simple - Dive right in by adding n6py package to your project via pip.- üì¶ Modular - Pick and choose which modules to import to suit your needs.- üé≤ Framework Agnostic - Use n6py with many common frameworks - NumPy, Pandas, etc ...## Installation```shpip install n6py```## Import```pyimport n6py as n6```## ContributionSee [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/n6ai/n6py/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).## LicenseMIT
